      Constructs a new Purchaser with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier for the purchaser.
      name - The name of the purchaser.
      furnitureType - The preferred furniture type of the purchaser.
      contactDetails - The contact details of the purchaser.
      purchaseDate - The date of the most recent purchase made by the purchaser.

      public boolean isPurchaseValid(int thresholdValue)
      Checks if the number of purchases made by the purchaser is below a specified threshold.
      Parameters:
      thresholdValue - The threshold value for the number of purchases.
      Returns:
      True if the number of purchases is below the threshold; false otherwise.
